column6: WaystoCap is a B2B marketplace where businesses in Africa can buy and sell products. WaystoCap facilitates the whole trading operation so that its buyers can find the most competitive products and obtain financing. The company was established in 2014 and is headquartered in Casablanca, Morocco.

Nigeria-based Red Star Express is a company that provides courier services, mailroom management services, freight services, logistics, warehousing and general haulage. The company operates through four segments: courier, freight, logistics, and support services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

BIA Group provides advice and support for clients in their mining, quarrying, forestry, public works and transport projects. BIA Group offers a range of equipment and accessories from manufacturers such as Komatsu, Sandvik, Bomag, Foton and Cummins. The company is based in Ebene, Mauritius.

Voxafrica is a bi-lingual, news and general entertainment channel offering programmes and interactive services on cable, satellite, internet, IPTV and also available in hotels throughout Africa. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in London, UK.

Ayka Textile is a vertically integrated textile manufacturer, covering spinning, knitting, dyeing and sewing facilities in Istanbul, Turkey. Ayka Textile was founded in 1988 as a ready-made garment manufacturer and exporter.

HeidelbergCement engages in the production and distribution of cement and aggregates worldwide. The company also offers ready-mixed concrete, concrete products, and concrete elements, as well as other related products and services. HeidelbergCement was founded in 1873 and is based in Heidelberg, Germany.

Banque Centrale Populaire provides banking products and services in Morocco, Africa, Europe, and internationally. The company accepts current accounts, cheque accounts, factoring accounts, savings accounts, term accounts, bank deposits, and other deposit accounts, as well as offers various loans. It also provides financing, investment banking, and asset management services. The company operates 1326 branches; 641 distribution points; and 1609 ATMs in Morocco. Banque Centrale Populaire was founded in 1926 and is based in Casablanca, Morocco.
